tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DriverInformation (
    driver_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    license_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    driving_history TEXT,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_info (
    vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    driver_license_number INT,
    make TEXT,
    model TEXT,
    year INT
);

CREATE TABLE DriverPersonalDetails (
  driver_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender CHAR(1)
)

CREATE TABLE LicenseInformation (
  license_number VARCHAR(20) PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  issue_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DrivingHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  violation_date DATE,
  violation_description VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE InsurancePremiums (
  insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  renewal_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DriverInformation (
  driver_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  license_number VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  driving_history JSONB,
  personal_details JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE VehicleInformation (
  vehicle_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT REFERENCES DriverInformation(driver_id),
  vehicle_make VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_model VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_year INT
)

CREATE TABLE AccidentHistory (
  accident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT REFERENCES DriverInformation(driver_id),
  accident_date DATE,
  accident_details JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE InsurancePolicy (
  policy_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT REFERENCES DriverInformation(driver_id),
  policy_type VARCHAR(50),
  policy_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE PremiumRates (
  rate_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_type VARCHAR(50),
  age_range VARCHAR(10),
  base_rate DECIMAL(10, 2)
)
